title: ABOUT ME
description:
Hi there I am Aadit Chadda. I am an aspiring software engineer with a passion for coding and a strong proficiency in multiple computer languages. With a track record of leading successful software and space-related operations, I have proven myself as a capable and dynamic professional in the tech industry.
                
                
                My achievements speak for themselves - I have won several hackathons, including the prestigious ARSSDC (Asian Regional Space Settlement Design Competition) and achieved runner-up status in the ISSDC (International Space Settlement Design Competition). These experiences have honed my technical skills, creative problem-solving abilities, and leadership qualities.
                
                
                I excel in working both as a part of a team and leading a team. I understand the importance of collaboration and know how to motivate and inspire others towards a common goal. My real-life work experience as a marketing intern at Rusk Media has further strengthened my communication, project management, and strategic planning skills.
                
                
                I am driven by my passion for innovation and my desire to contribute to the advancement of technology and space exploration. I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to grow and expand my skillset. If you are looking for a results-oriented software engineer with a proven track record of success in software development, team leadership, and space-related endeavors, I would love to connect and discuss how I can add value to your organization.
